mapper.sql: QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_CLASS, QUESTION_DIFFICULTY, POINT_NUMBER, POINT, SOURCE, USETIMES, TYPE, QUESTION_SCORE, QUESTION_TIME, GRADE_NAME, COURSE_NAME, VERSION_NAME, CHAPTER_NAME, SELECTION_A, SELECTION_B, SELECTION_C, SELECTION_D, ANSWER, ANALYSIS, QUESTION_HOT, OWNNER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, QUESTION_CONTENT, STATUS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from question
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into question (QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_CLASS, QUESTION_DIFFICULTY, POINT_NUMBER, POINT, SOURCE, USETIMES, TYPE, QUESTION_SCORE, QUESTION_TIME, GRADE_NAME, COURSE_NAME, VERSION_NAME, CHAPTER_NAME, SELECTION_A, SELECTION_B, SELECTION_C, SELECTION_D, ANSWER, ANALYSIS, QUESTION_HOT, OWNNER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, QUESTION_CONTENT, STATUS ) values (#{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pointNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usetimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chapterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionHot,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ownner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{questionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update question
QUESTION_ID = #{record.questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QUESTION_TYPE = #{record.questionType,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_CLASS = #{record.questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_DIFFICULTY = #{record.questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
